item.description:
GOLF 102 - Scramble Tournament Playing Lesson – for less than $17/hour

DON’T PAY $75 per hour for inferior lessons when you can get GOLF 101 Lessons for less than $17 per hour!

Reserve your spot today – visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449
Have you always wanted to play Golf? Do you want to improve your Golfing Skills and play better?

GOLF 102 takes you out on the Golf Course with our Certified Golf Teaching Professional to help you improve your Golf skills -while you play 9 holes in Tournament Scramble.

GOLF 102 gives you personalized playing lessons that will help with all aspects of your game. Each GOLF 102 lessons in 2 full hours – and as an added bonus – keep playing golf FREE of charge!

1 GOLF 102 lesson plus FREE Golf is $40
3 GOLF 102 lessons plus FREE Golf is $100 (less than $17 per hour)

Lessons are held on Wednesdays 5:30pm to 7:30pm –
After your GOLF 102 Lesson - continue Golfing for FREE


Classes are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown, CT 06457

Exit 20 off I-91 Country Club Road

10 minutes from Hartford * 10 minutes from New Haven

Read about Golf 101 in the Hartford Courant:
Visit http://www.courant.co...

From Connecticut, Massachusetts, New York and New Jersey, people have been taking advantage of
the GOLF 101 and GOLF 102 low price for quality Golf lessons!

Reserve your spot today – visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449

Learn to Golf and Improve Your Skills Without Breaking The Bank with Golf 101 and Golf 102 Lessons
- 6 Hours of Hands On Lessons for Only $100 (includes Golf Balls, Golf Clubs and ALL FEES)
- That is less than $17/hour for quality Golf Lessons from a Certified Teaching Professional!

– 6 Hours of hands on group lessons for only $100 (less than $17 per hour) with a Certified Teaching Golf Professional - small class size of 9 people gives you personal attention

Includes clubs and all course fees * Choose any 3 classes to fit your schedule

In 2009, more than 100 New Golfers graduated from Golf 101 lessons * 2010 Classes are filling up quickly!

· We will notify you of any postponements and to reschedule your makeup class *

GOLF 102 is designed to give you real life Scramble Tournament Playing experience with Playing Lessons with our Certified Golf Teaching Professional Instructor guiding you through the Golf Scramble with
Golfing Playing Lessons to take you out on the Golf Course and improve your Golf Skills with real life experience.

Whether you want to prepare for an upcoming Golf Tournament or game
or if you just want to improve your Golf Swing and golfing Skills, Golf 102Golf Tournament provides you with real life Golfing experience that can only come from playing in a Scramble Golf Tournament.

As an added bonus to your Golf 102 Scramble Tournament Playing Lessons, you can continue Golfing at no extra charge after you finish your Golf 102 Playing Lesson on this beautiful 9 hole Golf course in Middletown, CT Connecticut


Reserve your spot today – visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449
item.how_to_find_us: Meet the GOLF 101 Instructor at the clubhouse

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy
